item.title: Ruby Http Request
item.description: During trial on sending GET request to AppFiguresâ€™ RESTful API, I started with net/http and add my client key to request hash. When firing the request, I have some more request params to use. Because of misunderstanding on how the server deal with params and request header, I added those params into request header and had wrong expectation. Code is like below. uri = URI(base_url) request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri) request.basic_auth('username', 'password') request['X-Client-Key'] = 'app_key' if args args.
